title: SEC Sets Third Crypto Roundtable Date For April 25
body: Key Takeaways: The SEC will host its third crypto-focused roundtable of 2025, titled ‚ÄúKnow Your Custodian: Key Considerations for Crypto Custody,‚Äù on April 25 at its Washington D.C. headquarters, with a focus on the complexities of cryptocurrency custody. Panelists include top legal and strategy executives from leading crypto firms like Fireblocks, Fidelity Digital Assets, Etana Custody, and 1kx, highlighting the SEC‚Äôs effort to involve industry voices in shaping regulatory frameworks. Led by Commissioner Hester Peirce, the newly formed Crypto Task Force aims to move away from the SEC‚Äôs previous regulation-by-enforcement model, seeking instead to establish clear guidelines and practical pathways for crypto regulation.. The United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has set its third crypto roundtable this year for April 25, a press release on the federal regulator‚Äôs website shows. SEC‚Äôs Crypto Task Force Sets Roundtable Date Titled ‚ÄúKnow Your Custodian: Key Considerations for Crypto Custody,‚Äù the roundtable will be held at SEC headquarters in Washington D.C. from 1 ‚Äì 5 p.m. and widely cover custody arrangements for cryptocurrencies. Panelists at the event Fireblocks‚Äô Chief Legal & Compliance Officer JZFidelity Digital Assets‚Äô Head of Product Strategy Terrence Dempsey, Etana Custody Inc. CEO Brandon Russell, and 1kx General Counsel Larry Florio, among others. SEC announces agenda and panelists for roundtable on crypto custody: https://t.co/UCQVkYXkAv ‚Äî U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (@SECGov) April 17, 2025 ‚ÄúIt is important for the SEC to grapple with custody issues, which are some of the most challenging as we seek to integrate crypto assets into our regulatory structure,‚Äù said Commissioner Hester M. Peirce, leader of the Crypto Task Force. ‚ÄúWe look forward to hearing from experts on these important issues.‚Äù Crypto Regulatory Framework Discussions Emerge Launched under SEC Acting Chair Mark T. Uyeda this past January, the Crypto Task Force‚Äôs mission is to ‚Äúdraw clear regulatory lines, provide realistic paths to registration, craft sensible disclosure frameworks, and deploy enforcement resources judiciously‚Äù for the blockchain sector. Commissioner Hester Peirce serves as the task force‚Äôs leader, while Richard Gabbert, Senior Advisor to the Acting Chairman, and Taylor Asher, Senior Policy Advisor to the Acting Chairman, are the agency-wide effort‚Äôs Chief of Staff and Chief Policy Advisor. The creation of the task force stands in stark contrast to the regulating body‚Äôs prior regulation-by-enforcement approach to the digital asset industry under previous Chair Gary Gensler. U.S. President Donald Trump campaigned largely on enacting crypto-friendly regulations upon his return to the Oval Office, prompting a surge of momentum throughout the crypto community. However, it remains to be seen what regulatory ideas will emerge from the SEC‚Äôs roundtables. The post SEC Sets Third Crypto Roundtable Date For April 25 appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Alert: Slovenia Considers 25% Crypto Tax ‚Äì Decoding the Impact
body: Cryptocurrency investors in Slovenia, brace yourselves! A significant shift in the regulatory landscape might be on the horizon. The Slovenian Finance Ministry has dropped a bombshell proposal: a 25% tax on profits from individual crypto investments. This move, aimed at plugging a perceived tax loophole, is currently open for public discussion until May 5th. If it gets the green light from parliament, this new law could come into effect as early as January 1, 2026. Let‚Äôs dive deep into what this crypto tax Slovenia proposal entails and what it could mean for you. Why the Sudden Focus on Crypto Tax in Slovenia? For some time, Slovenia has been known for its relatively lenient stance on cryptocurrency taxation, often seen as a haven for crypto enthusiasts within the European Union. However, this proposed 25% tax on individual crypto profits tax Slovenia signals a potential change in direction. The government‚Äôs rationale is clear: to close an existing tax loophole and generate revenue. According to Bloomberg reports, the estimated annual revenue from this tax could range anywhere from ‚Ç¨2.5 million to a substantial ‚Ç¨25 million. But why now? Several factors could be at play: Increased Crypto Adoption: As cryptocurrency adoption grows globally and within Slovenia, governments are increasingly looking at ways to tax this burgeoning asset class. EU Pressure and Harmonization: There‚Äôs a broader trend within the European Union towards harmonizing tax regulations, including those related to digital assets. Slovenia might be aligning itself with this trend. Revenue Generation: Governments worldwide are constantly seeking new revenue streams, and the growing crypto market presents an attractive target for taxation. Fairness and Equity: The argument is often made that profits from crypto investments should be taxed similarly to other forms of investment gains to ensure fairness in the tax system. Decoding the Proposed 25% Slovenia Crypto Tax Rate The core of the proposal is a 25% tax on individual cryptocurrency tax Slovenia gains. This is a significant percentage and warrants careful consideration. Let‚Äôs break down what this could mean: Who is Affected? This tax specifically targets individual investors and their profits from crypto investments. It‚Äôs crucial to note that it focuses on gains, not the principal investment amount. Tax Rate: A flat 25% tax rate is proposed. This is a considerable tax rate, potentially impacting the profitability of crypto investments for Slovenian residents. Taxable Events: The proposal likely defines specific taxable events, such as selling cryptocurrency for fiat currency or potentially exchanging one cryptocurrency for another. The specifics will be crucial to understand. Implementation Date: If approved, the law is slated to take effect on January 1, 2026. This gives investors some time to prepare, but also underscores the urgency to understand and potentially respond to the proposal during the public comment period. Potential Benefits and Challenges of the New Crypto Tax Law Like any tax policy, the proposed Slovenia crypto tax law comes with its own set of potential benefits and challenges. Let‚Äôs weigh them out: Potential Benefits: Increased Government Revenue: The most direct benefit is the potential for increased revenue for the Slovenian government. This revenue could be used for public services and infrastructure projects. Level Playing Field: Taxing crypto profits could create a more level playing field with traditional investments, which are typically subject to capital gains taxes. Regulatory Clarity: While taxation can be seen as a burden, it also provides a degree of regulatory clarity for the crypto sector in Slovenia. Clear rules can foster a more stable and predictable environment. Potential Challenges: Impact on Crypto Innovation: A high tax rate could potentially stifle innovation and investment in the crypto sector within Slovenia. It might make Slovenia less attractive compared to jurisdictions with more favorable tax regimes. Compliance Burden: Implementing and complying with crypto tax regulations can be complex. Both taxpayers and tax authorities will need to adapt to new reporting and compliance requirements. Capital Flight: If the tax regime is perceived as too burdensome, there‚Äôs a risk of capital flight, with crypto businesses and investors potentially moving to more tax-friendly locations. Enforcement Challenges: Taxing crypto assets can be challenging due to their decentralized and often borderless nature. Effective enforcement will be crucial for the success of this tax law. What Does This Mean for Crypto Investors in Slovenia? Actionable Insights For crypto investors in Slovenia, this proposed cryptocurrency tax law is a significant development that requires attention and proactive steps: Stay Informed: Keep a close watch on the developments regarding this proposal. Follow news outlets and official announcements from the Slovenian Finance Ministry. Participate in Public Comment: The public comment period is open until May 5th. If you are affected by this proposal, consider submitting your comments and feedback. Your voice matters! Seek Professional Advice: Consult with a tax advisor or financial professional to understand how this proposed law might impact your specific crypto investments and tax obligations. Tax Planning: Start thinking about tax planning strategies in light of this potential new tax regime. This might involve reviewing your investment strategies and considering the tax implications of your crypto activities. Long-Term Perspective: Consider the long-term implications of this tax law on the Slovenian crypto market. Think about how it might affect your investment decisions in the future. Examples of Crypto Tax Regulations in Other Countries To put Slovenia‚Äôs proposal into perspective, let‚Äôs briefly look at how other countries are approaching crypto regulation and taxation: Country Crypto Tax Approach Germany Tax-free after one year of holding for individuals. Otherwise, taxed as income tax. Portugal Generally no personal income tax on crypto gains (subject to change). United States Taxed as property, with capital gains tax rates applying based on holding period. India 30% tax on crypto gains, with limited deductions. South Korea 20% tax on crypto gains exceeding a certain threshold (implementation delayed). Note: Crypto tax regulations are constantly evolving, and this table provides a simplified overview. Always consult with a tax professional for specific advice. As you can see, the approach to crypto taxation varies significantly across different jurisdictions. Slovenia‚Äôs proposed 25% tax rate, if implemented, would place it somewhere in the mid-to-high range compared to other countries. The final impact will depend on the specific details of the law and how effectively it is implemented and enforced. Conclusion: Navigating the Evolving Crypto Tax Landscape in Slovenia The proposed 25% tax on individual crypto profits in Slovenia marks a potentially shocking turning point in the country‚Äôs approach to cryptocurrency regulation. While aimed at closing tax loopholes and generating revenue, it also presents challenges for crypto investors and the broader crypto ecosystem in Slovenia. Staying informed, participating in the public discourse, and seeking professional advice are crucial steps for navigating this evolving landscape. The future of crypto regulation in Slovenia is now in a period of critical discussion and development. Keep watching this space! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: Confidence Surge: a16z Crypto Amplifies LayerZero Investment with $55M Locked ZRO Token Acquisition
body: In a powerful display of confidence in cross-chain technology, a16z Crypto has significantly deepened its commitment to LayerZero by acquiring an additional $55 million worth of ZRO tokens. This substantial LayerZero investment , announced on X, comes with a three-year lock-up period, signaling a long-term belief in the protocol‚Äôs potential. But what does this mean for LayerZero, a16z crypto, and the broader Web3 ecosystem? Let‚Äôs dive into the details of this exciting development. Why is a16z Crypto Doubling Down on LayerZero? For those familiar with the crypto venture capital landscape, a16z crypto is a name synonymous with strategic investments and backing for groundbreaking projects. Their continued support for LayerZero is not entirely new; they previously led LayerZero‚Äôs Series A+ and Series B funding rounds. This latest acquisition, however, is more than just another funding round. It‚Äôs a strong endorsement, a public declaration of faith in LayerZero‚Äôs technology and its future trajectory. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of what makes this investment noteworthy: Significant Investment Size: $55 million is a considerable sum, especially in the current market climate. It demonstrates a substantial financial commitment from a major player like a16z. Token Lock-up Period: The three-year lock-up is crucial. It means a16z is not looking for a quick flip. They are in it for the long haul, indicating a belief in the long-term growth and success of LayerZero and the ZRO token . Existing Relationship: a16z‚Äôs prior investments in LayerZero suggest a deep understanding of the project, its team, and its technology. This isn‚Äôt a speculative bet; it‚Äôs a calculated move based on existing conviction. Strategic Alignment: LayerZero‚Äôs mission to solve blockchain interoperability aligns perfectly with the broader Web3 vision of a connected and decentralized future, a vision a16z actively champions. Key Aspect Details of a16z‚Äôs LayerZero Investment Investor a16z Crypto Investment Amount $55 million Token ZRO Lock-up Period 3 years Previous Involvement Led Series A+ and Series B rounds Understanding LayerZero: The Interoperability Powerhouse For those newer to the crypto space, understanding LayerZero is crucial to appreciating the significance of this crypto venture capital injection. LayerZero is designed to be an omnichain interoperability protocol. In simpler terms, it‚Äôs built to connect different blockchains seamlessly. Imagine a world where moving assets or data between Ethereum, Solana, Avalanche, and other blockchains is as easy as sending an email. That‚Äôs the problem LayerZero is tackling. Here‚Äôs why interoperability is so vital and why LayerZero stands out: Breaking Down Silos: Currently, blockchains often operate in isolation. LayerZero aims to break down these silos, creating a more unified and efficient crypto ecosystem. Enhanced User Experience: Interoperability simplifies the user experience. Users won‚Äôt need to navigate complex bridges or worry about chain compatibility when interacting with different dApps (decentralized applications). Developer Flexibility: LayerZero empowers developers to build truly omnichain applications, leveraging the strengths of multiple blockchains without being confined to a single ecosystem. Increased Capital Efficiency: By enabling seamless asset transfer across chains, LayerZero can improve capital efficiency within the crypto market. LayerZero‚Äôs technology utilizes an innovative approach called the Ultra Light Node (ULN), which offers a balance of security and efficiency in cross-chain communication. This is a key differentiator compared to earlier bridging solutions that often faced security vulnerabilities or were cumbersome to use. The Role of Web3 Funding and Venture Capital in Crypto Growth The web3 funding landscape is heavily influenced by venture capital firms like a16z. These firms play a crucial role in nurturing and accelerating the growth of promising crypto projects. Their investments are not just about the money; they bring expertise, networks, and credibility to the table. Here‚Äôs how venture capital fuels the Web3 revolution: Financial Resources: VC funding provides the capital needed for projects to develop their technology, build teams, and scale their operations. Strategic Guidance: VC firms often offer strategic advice and mentorship, helping projects navigate the complexities of the crypto market and build sustainable businesses. Network Effects: VCs have extensive networks within the industry, connecting projects with potential partners, talent, and future investors. Validation and Credibility: Investment from reputable VCs like a16z adds significant validation and credibility to a project, attracting further attention and adoption. a16z‚Äôs increased investment in LayerZero underscores the continued confidence of institutional investors in the long-term potential of Web3 and the underlying technologies that power it. Despite market fluctuations and regulatory uncertainties, smart money is still flowing into the space, seeking out projects with strong fundamentals and innovative solutions. What‚Äôs Next for LayerZero and the ZRO Token? With this fresh infusion of capital and the unwavering backing of a16z crypto , LayerZero is well-positioned to further develop its technology and expand its ecosystem. The three-year lock-up on the ZRO token acquisition suggests a focus on long-term value creation rather than short-term gains. Potential future developments for LayerZero and ZRO could include: Ecosystem Growth: We can expect to see more dApps and projects integrating LayerZero for cross-chain functionality, expanding its network effect. Technology Advancements: LayerZero may continue to innovate and enhance its protocol, potentially improving speed, security, and cost-effectiveness. Token Utility Expansion: The utility of the ZRO token within the LayerZero ecosystem could evolve, potentially encompassing governance, staking, or other functionalities. Mainstream Adoption: As interoperability becomes increasingly crucial, LayerZero could play a pivotal role in driving mainstream adoption of Web3 technologies. Conclusion: A Confident Stride Towards Interoperable Web3 a16z Crypto‚Äôs $55 million investment in locked ZRO tokens is a resounding vote of confidence in LayerZero and the future of blockchain interoperability. It highlights the strategic importance of cross-chain solutions in building a more connected and user-friendly Web3 ecosystem. This move not only benefits LayerZero directly but also sends a positive signal to the broader crypto market, reinforcing the long-term investment thesis for innovative projects tackling fundamental challenges. As LayerZero continues to build and expand, its impact on the crypto landscape is poised to become even more profound, paving the way for a truly omnichain future. title: Google‚Äôs AI safety promises under scrutiny after Gemini report
body: Google shared a safety paper on its flagship artificial‚Äëintelligence model, Gemini 2.5 Pro. Experts say it leaves key risks unexplained. The company posted the technical paper on Thursday, several weeks after it released Gemini 2.5 Pro to customers. The document lists the internal tests Google ran on the model but offers few facts on how the system behaves under overload or misuse. Researchers who reviewed the paper told TechCrunch the missing details make it hard to judge whether Gemini 2.5 Pro is truly safe for broad use. Technical reports are one of the main ways the public learns what advanced AI systems can and cannot do. A thorough report often shows where a model fails and where it might be misused. Many AI researchers treat these papers as honest efforts to back up a company‚Äôs safety claims. Google handles safety reporting differently. Google releases a report only after a model is no longer tagged ‚Äúexperimental,‚Äù and it moves certain ‚Äúdangerous capability‚Äù findings into a separate audit that is not published at once. As a result, the public paper does not cover every threat Google has tested for. Several analysts said the new Gemini 2.5 Pro document is a stark case of limited disclosure. They also noticed that the report never refers to Google‚Äôs Frontier Safety Framework, or FSF, a policy the company announced last year to spot future AI powers that could cause ‚Äúsevere harm.‚Äù ‚ÄúThis report is very sparse, contains minimal information, and arrived weeks after the model went public,‚Äù said Peter Wildeford, co‚Äëfounder of the Institute for AI Policy and Strategy. ‚ÄúIt is impossible to confirm whether Google is meeting its own promises, and therefore impossible to judge the safety and security of its models.‚Äù Thomas Woodside, co‚Äëfounder of the Secure AI Project, said he was glad any paper had appeared at all, yet he doubted Google‚Äôs plan to release steady follow‚Äëups. He pointed out that the last time the firm shared results from dangerous‚Äëcapability tests was June 2024, and that paper covered a model announced in February of the same year. Confidence slipped further when observers saw no safety paper for Gemini 2.5 Flash, a slimmer and faster model Google revealed last week. A company spokesperson said a Flash paper is ‚Äúcoming soon.‚Äù ‚ÄúI hope this is a real promise to start giving more frequent updates,‚Äù Woodside said. ‚ÄúThose updates should include results for models that have not yet reached the public, because those models may also pose serious risks.‚Äù Google now falls short on transparency Meta‚Äôs safety note for its new Llama 4 models runs only a few pages, while OpenAI chose not to publish any report at all for its GPT‚Äë4.1 series. The shortage of detail comes at a tense time. Two years ago, Google told the U.S. government it would post safety papers for every ‚Äúsignificant‚Äù AI model within scope.‚Äù The company made similar pledges to officials in other countries, saying it would offer ‚Äúpublic transparency‚Äù about its AI products. Kevin Bankston, senior adviser on AI governance at the Center for Democracy and Technology, called the releases from leading labs a ‚Äúrace to the bottom‚Äù on safety. ‚ÄúCombined with reports that rival labs like OpenAI have cut safety‚Äëtesting time before release from months to days, this meager documentation for Google‚Äôs top model tells a troubling story of a race to the bottom on AI safety and transparency as companies rush their models to market,‚Äù he added. Google says much of its safety work happens behind closed doors. The company states that every model undergoes strict tests, including ‚Äúadversarial red teaming,‚Äù before any public launch. title: Explosion in Bitcoin Futures Volume: Coinbase International Dominates with $100B Surge
body: Hold onto your hats, crypto enthusiasts! The world of digital asset derivatives is heating up, and Coinbase International is making waves. Last week, this Bermuda-based platform, a sibling to the U.S. crypto giant Coinbase, witnessed a massive surge in Bitcoin futures volume , hitting a staggering $100 billion. Yes, you read that right ‚Äì $100 billion in just one week! This isn‚Äôt just a blip on the radar; it‚Äôs a significant indicator of the evolving landscape of crypto trading and the growing appetite for derivatives outside the heavily regulated U.S. market. Why the Sudden Spike in Bitcoin Futures Volume? So, what‚Äôs fueling this explosive growth in Bitcoin futures volume on Coinbase International? Several factors are likely at play, all converging to create a perfect storm for derivatives trading: Market Volatility: The crypto market is known for its rollercoaster rides, and recent weeks have been no exception. Periods of high volatility often drive traders towards derivatives markets. Why? Because futures contracts allow traders to speculate on price movements ‚Äì both up and down ‚Äì without actually holding the underlying asset. This can be particularly attractive during uncertain times. Demand for Crypto Derivatives: U.S. regulations are stringent when it comes to crypto derivatives. Platforms like Coinbase in the U.S. don‚Äôt offer the same range of perpetual futures contracts that are available on international exchanges. Traders seeking access to these instruments are naturally drawn to platforms like Coinbase International . Institutional Interest: While retail traders are a significant part of the crypto market, the $100 billion figure suggests a substantial influx of institutional capital. Institutional demand for crypto exposure is on the rise, and derivatives offer a sophisticated way for institutions to participate in the market, manage risk, and potentially enhance returns. Coinbase‚Äôs Global Expansion: Coinbase‚Äôs strategic move to establish Coinbase International in Bermuda is paying off. It allows them to tap into the global derivatives market and cater to a wider audience beyond the U.S. This expansion positions Coinbase as a key player in the international crypto derivatives space. Coinbase International: A Rising Star in Crypto Derivatives Coinbase International , though relatively new, is rapidly establishing itself as a force to be reckoned with in the crypto derivatives market. Here‚Äôs a closer look at what makes it stand out: Backed by Coinbase: The platform benefits from the reputation and infrastructure of Coinbase, a publicly traded and well-respected name in the crypto industry. This association provides a level of trust and security that is crucial in the often-unregulated world of crypto exchanges. Focus on Perpetual Futures: Perpetual futures contracts are a popular type of crypto derivative that doesn‚Äôt have an expiry date. This allows traders to hold positions for as long as they want, making them attractive for both short-term speculation and longer-term trading strategies. Global Reach: Being based in Bermuda allows Coinbase International to serve a global audience, bypassing some of the regulatory hurdles faced by U.S.-based platforms. This global accessibility is a major advantage in attracting international traders and institutional demand . Competitive Trading Environment: The platform likely offers competitive trading fees and a robust trading engine to attract and retain users in the highly competitive crypto exchange landscape. The Allure of Futures Trading: Benefits and Risks Futures trading , particularly in the crypto market, offers both exciting opportunities and significant risks. Understanding these is crucial for anyone considering venturing into this space. Benefits of Futures Trading: Leverage: Futures contracts allow traders to control a larger position with a smaller amount of capital. This leverage can amplify profits, but also losses. Hedging: Futures can be used to hedge against price volatility in the spot market. For example, if you hold Bitcoin, you can use Bitcoin futures to protect against potential price declines. Profit from Falling Prices: Unlike traditional spot trading where you primarily profit from price increases, futures allow you to profit from both rising and falling prices by taking long or short positions. Liquidity: Major crypto futures exchanges generally offer high liquidity, allowing for efficient order execution. Risks of Futures Trading: High Volatility: The crypto market is inherently volatile, and this volatility is amplified in futures trading due to leverage. Liquidation Risk: Leverage increases the risk of liquidation. If the market moves against your position, you could lose your initial margin and potentially more. Complexity: Futures trading can be more complex than spot trading, requiring a deeper understanding of margin, leverage, and contract specifications. Regulatory Uncertainty: The regulatory landscape for crypto derivatives is still evolving, and changes in regulations could impact the market. Institutional Demand: The Driving Force? While retail interest in crypto remains strong, the surge in futures trading volume, especially on platforms like Coinbase International , increasingly points towards the growing influence of institutional demand . Institutions, such as hedge funds, asset managers, and corporations, are increasingly looking at crypto as a legitimate asset class. Here‚Äôs why institutional demand is a significant factor: Portfolio Diversification: Institutions are constantly seeking diversification to manage risk and enhance returns. Crypto, with its low correlation to traditional assets, offers a compelling diversification opportunity. Sophisticated Trading Strategies: Institutions often employ more sophisticated trading strategies, including derivatives trading, to optimize their crypto exposure. Increased Market Maturity: As the crypto market matures, institutions are becoming more comfortable participating, driven by factors like improved custody solutions, clearer regulatory frameworks (in some jurisdictions), and growing market infrastructure. Search for Yield: In a low-interest-rate environment, institutions are constantly searching for yield. Crypto, despite its volatility, offers the potential for higher returns compared to traditional fixed-income assets. Actionable Insights for Crypto Traders What does this Bitcoin futures volume surge on Coinbase International mean for you, the crypto trader? Keep an Eye on Derivatives Markets: The derivatives market is becoming increasingly important in the crypto ecosystem. Monitoring trading volumes and trends on platforms like Coinbase International can provide valuable insights into market sentiment and potential price movements. Understand Futures Trading: If you‚Äôre not already familiar with futures trading, now might be a good time to learn the basics. While it comes with risks, it also offers powerful tools for speculation, hedging, and portfolio management. Consider Global Platforms: Don‚Äôt limit yourself to U.S.-regulated exchanges, especially if you‚Äôre interested in derivatives. Explore international platforms like Coinbase International to access a wider range of crypto products and trading opportunities. Stay Informed about Regulations: The regulatory landscape for crypto derivatives is constantly evolving. Stay updated on regulatory developments in different jurisdictions to understand the implications for your trading activities. Conclusion: The Future is Derivatives? The $100 billion Bitcoin futures volume on Coinbase International is not just a number; it‚Äôs a testament to the growing sophistication and globalization of the crypto market. It signals a clear shift towards derivatives trading, driven by market volatility, institutional demand , and the strategic expansion of platforms like Coinbase. As the crypto space matures, expect to see derivatives playing an even more central role, offering both opportunities and challenges for traders and investors alike. The surge on Coinbase International is a powerful reminder that the crypto revolution is far from over ‚Äì it‚Äôs just entering a new, more complex, and potentially more rewarding phase. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: Bitcoin Dominates Q1: Altcoin Season Nowhere In Sight‚ÄîReport
body: According to CoinGecko‚Äôs 2025 Q1 Report, the cryptocurrency market, led by Bitcoin, lost nearly one-fifth of its value in the first quarter of 2025, fully negating the gains made towards the end of 2024. Related Reading: Is Shiba Inu On Track To Dethrone Dogecoin? Here‚Äôs What The Experts Say Total market value witnessed a drop of $3.8 trillion to $2.8 trillion, an 18.6% decline over the quarter. This sharp plunge marked the turnaround before the inauguration of Donald Trump as US president, in stark contrast to last year‚Äôs ramp up. Trading volume also suffered some contractions, as the daily volumes dropped to $146 billion, a decrease of 27%. Bitcoin Rules Market While Others Decline Bitcoin insulated itself reasonably from the turbulence in other cryptocurrencies so that its market share reached nearly 60%, the highest in four years. Bitcoin achieved peak valuation at $106,182 in January shortly after inauguration but plunged almost 12% to finish the quarter at $82,514. Compared with Bitcoin during this period, gold and US Treasury bonds were traditional safe-haven investments with lower performance. Compared to Ethereum, however, the situation was much worse. Its price fell by 45%, essentially wiping out all gains in 2024. Its market share dropped to almost 8%, the lowest it has been since the end of 2019. As it has been observed by most analysts, this downturn is not something new since more and more activities have shifted toward ‚ÄúLayer 2‚Äù networks built atop Ethereum and not using the Ethereum main network. Meme Coins Crash After Major Scam The previously red-hot meme coin space received a rude wake-up call in early 2025. Following a boom in Trump-themed tokens, the industry was severely hurt when the Libra token ‚Äì introduced by Argentina‚Äôs President Javier Milei ‚Äì proved to be a scam. The project was abandoned by developers after they had taken investors‚Äô funds, shattering confidence in such tokens. By late March, new token launches on the platform Pump.fun per day had dropped by over 50%. DeFi Industry Loses More Than A Quarter Of Its Value Not even the decentralized finance (DeFi) industry was exempted. Overall money in DeFi projects dropped 27% to $48 billion during the first quarter. Ethereum‚Äôs dominance in the DeFi space declined to 56% by quarter-end. Related Reading: Solana Hits Milestone As Canada OKs First Spot ETFs Not everything was negative, though. Stablecoins such as Tether (USDT) and USD Coin (USDC) became more popular with investors seeking a safer bet as the market tanked. Solana also remained in its leadership position, holding 39.6% of all decentralized exchange (DEX) trading during Q1, courtesy mostly of meme coin mania. Even Solana‚Äôs leadership, however, started to wane at the end of the period as the meme coin mania declined. The dramatic shift in market sentiment shows how quickly cryptocurrency fortunes can change. After a promising end to 2024, the new year brought a harsh reality check for crypto investors, with nearly $1 trillion in market value disappearing in just three months. title: Coinbase Adds Solana Wallets, Upgrades Infrastructure With 5x Faster Block Processing and 4x Better RPC Performance
body: Coinbase has introduced support for Solana wallets on its developer platform, enabling developers to create wallets with no key management, plug-and-play APIs, and wallet creation times of under 500 milliseconds. The company has also upgraded its Solana infrastructure, increasing block processing throughput by five times through asynchronous transaction processing and improving remote procedure call (RPC) performance by four times using bare metal servers. title: EigenLayer Activates Mainnet Slashing on April 17, Implementing ELIPs 002‚Äì004 and Achieving Feature-Complete Status
body: EigenLayer launched its slashing mechanism on mainnet on April 17, 2025, achieving feature-complete status. The upgrade was executed by the EigenLayer Protocol Council, which is implementing ELIPs 002, 003, and 004 to enable secure, onchain slashing. With slashing now live, EigenLayer enforces accountability and programmable trust for over 190 actively validated services (AVSs) and more than 80,000 stakers. The mechanism penalizes validators and providers for protocol violations, such as failing to fulfill commitments or acting maliciously, by reducing their staked assets. title: Trump says China has reached out for trade deals
body: President Donald Trump said on Thursday that China has reached out for trade talks. Trump signaled that he is reluctant to impose further tariffs on China because doing so would delay a trade deal. Speaking to reporters in the Oval Office, the president said people he regards as direct envoys of Chinese leader Xi‚ÄØJinping had ‚Äúreached out a number of times‚Äù in recent days. ‚ÄúI have a very good relationship with President‚ÄØXi, and I think it‚Äôs going to continue,‚Äù Trump said. Asked if Xi himself had called, Trump replied, ‚ÄúWell, the same. I view it very similar. It would be top levels of China.‚Äù Trump‚Äôs comments come after months of rising import duties that have pushed U.S. taxes on Chinese goods to a combined 145‚ÄØpercent and prompted Beijing to retaliate with tariffs of 125‚ÄØpercent. The trade war has halted commerce between the world‚Äôs two largest economies and complicated a separate effort to force ByteDance‚ÄØLtd. to divest TikTok‚Äôs American operations. On Thursday, the President suggested for the first time that further tariff hikes could backfire. ‚ÄúAt a certain point I don‚Äôt want them to go higher because at a certain point you make it where people don‚Äôt buy,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúSo I may not want to go higher, or I may not want to even go up to that level. I may want to go to less because, you know, you want people to buy.‚Äù Trump may provide a relief in tariffs if China accepts TikTok divestiture Both capitals have insisted that the other side make the next move. Even so, Trump sounded upbeat about the chances of linking a wider trade deal with a TikTok deal . ‚ÄúWell, we have a deal for TikTok, but it‚Äôll be subject to China, so we‚Äôll just delay the deal till this thing works out,‚Äù he said. He argued that selling TikTok‚Äôs U.S. assets to ‚Äúsome of the best companies in the world‚Äù would satisfy American security worries and still benefit Beijing. ‚ÄúI think it‚Äôs a good deal for China,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúTikTok is good for China. And I think they‚Äôd like to see us do a deal, especially the deal that we have pretty much done.‚Äù When asked about whether tariff relief might be offered if China accepts the divestiture plan, the president answered that nothing was off the table. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a natural ‚Äî if we‚Äôre making a deal. I guess we‚Äôll spend five minutes to talk about TikTok. It wouldn‚Äôt take very long,‚Äù he said. Trump declined to describe any timetable for new talks or for easing duties. He also avoided saying whether he and Xi had spoken directly, stressing instead that any overture from Beijing would reflect Xi‚Äôs personal approval. ‚ÄúIf you knew him you would know that if they reached out, he knew exactly,‚Äù Trump said. ‚ÄúHe knew everything about it, he runs it very tight, very strong, very smart.‚Äù With both sides dug in publicly, it remains unclear how soon formal negotiations might resume. But Thursday‚Äôs remarks signal the White House could recalibrate its tariff strategy if it believes the two superpowers are ready to bargain on a package that revives trade flows and settles the future of TikTok in the U.S. Cryptopolitan Academy: Want to grow your money in 2025? Learn how to do it with DeFi in our upcoming webclass. Save Your Spot

title: South Korean Regulator Extends Bithumb Inspection, Plans Coinone Probe
body: The South Korean Financial Intelligence Unit (FIU) has extended the period of its on-site inspection of the Bithumb crypto exchange , with a Coinone inspection set to start next week. The media outlet Daehan Kyungjae reported that FIU, which answers to the Financial Services Commission (FSC), will wrap up its investigation on April 18. The probe began on March 17, and was originally planned to conclude on March 28. The investigation is primarily aimed at checking exchanges‚Äô compliance with anti-money laundering protocols. After Bithumb, Coinone will be the last of South Korea‚Äôs five fiat KRW-trading exchanges to face the FIU probe. Bithumb, Coinone ‚Äì Regulators Look to Wrap AML Probes The regulator has already wrapped up its on-site investigations of Korbit, GOPAX, and the market-leading Upbit exchange. Trading volumes on the Bithumb crypto exchange over the past 14 days. (Source: CoinGecko) The Upbit probe unearthed a slew of Know-Your-Customer (KYC) verification violations, with the FSC later dishing out a three-month punishment. In late March, a branch of the Seoul Administrative Court suspended the ban for 30 days . The media outlet quoted an anonymous official from an unnamed domestic crypto exchange as saying that the FIU‚Äôs extension ‚Äúmay be due to the vast amount of data‚Äù it is now combing through. However, the same individual claimed there was a ‚Äúsuspicion‚Äù that the delay was due to a specific transaction. The individual claimed that Bithumb wallets had ‚Äútransferred more than 60 million coins, worth approximately 22.4 billion won (over $15.8 million), to an exchange that is not registered with the financial authorities.‚Äù The FIU plans to begin its on-site inspection at Coinone on April 21. The Bank of Korea held its benchmark interest rate steady to foster stability after consumer inflation unexpectedly picked up and the won weakened to a 16-year-low https://t.co/qFAtQ7A7VU ‚Äî Bloomberg (@business) April 17, 2025 FSS Investigations Another regulator, the Financial Supervisory Service (FSS), has also recently wrapped up its investigations at Bithumb and Coinone. This probe reportedly discovered that Bithumb had misused company funds for housing allowances. Trading volumes on the Coinone crypto exchange over the past 14 days. (Source: CoinGecko) The FSS claims that a former Bithumb CEO and a current advisor used company-provided apartment deposits to lease a property to a third party. The regulator thinks that one of the executives used a KRW 1.1 billion ($778,000) deposit from Bithumb to pay for a home they then leased to a resident in exchange for rent payments worth around $2 million. The Seoul Southern District Prosecutors‚Äô Office‚Äôs crypto investigation team followed up with a raid of Bithumb‚Äôs headquarters last month. Coinone, meanwhile, faced an FSS probe of its own late last year. The investigation followed a massive December 9 Movement (MOVE) token price spike on the Coinone platform. The post South Korean Regulator Extends Bithumb Inspection, Plans Coinone Probe appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: ‚ÄòBig Short‚Äô Investor Steve Eisman Derisks, Says Stock Market Volatility Will Be Here for a While
body: Steve Eisman says he‚Äôs taking a wait-and-see approach to the stock market right now. In a new interview with CNBC , the famous investor notes he‚Äôs dialed down the risk in his personal portfolio. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm waiting. I think we‚Äôre going to have volatility for quite a while. The Trump Administration has set up a situation where they‚Äôre going to be negotiating with multiple countries on multiple issues. It‚Äôs not going to take a couple of weeks, it‚Äôs going to take a few months, so I think, for the time being, volatility‚Äôs going to be here for a while.‚Äù Eisman, who‚Äôs known primarily for betting against the housing market prior to the American subprime mortgage crisis, says stocks like Nvidia ( NVDA ) and Apollo Global Management ( APO ) have ‚Äústrong long-term fundamentals‚Äù and are primed to make investors money over multi-year timeframes, though he‚Äôs less certain about the shorter term. ‚ÄúI would not even hazard a guess as to what any stock will do over the next few months, simply because we‚Äôre in the type of market where‚Ä¶ there‚Äôs only one variable that matters, and right now the variable that matters is the president of the United States, and I can‚Äôt handicap that right now.‚Äù In terms of NVIDIA specifically, the famed investor says it‚Äôs only ‚Äúthe early innings of the AI revolution,‚Äù and he predicts the tech giant still has room to grow. title: Bitcoin Price To Break $125,000 But Sell Everything In October, Analyst Warns
body: Bitcoin‚Äôs price action in recent weeks has been mostly highlighted by a trading range between $80,000 and $85,000, with a struggle to reclaim buying pressure. Despite the current lack of a strong bullish momentum, many crypto analysts are banking on a bullish continuation and a new Bitcoin price all-time high before the end of 2025. According to crypto analyst TradingShot, Bitcoin could be approaching the final leg of this bull cycle, predicting a peak above $125,000. However, this analysis comes with a caveat that an extended bear market might roll in by October 2025. Long-Term Bitcoin Cycles Hint At Imminent Peak TradingShot‚Äôs analysis, which was posted on the TradingView platform, is based on over a decade of symmetrical Bitcoin market behavior that shows both bull and bear cycles unfolding in consistent timeframes. According to TradingShot, the bull cycles dating back to 2015 have all lasted approximately 1,064 days, or 152 weeks, with each cycle topping out almost exactly three years after the previous bottom. On the other hand, bear cycles have consistently lasted for around one year, either from December to December or November to November. Related Reading: Bitcoin Price Following Analyst‚Äôs Prediction For Bullish Breakout, Here‚Äôs The Target This historical symmetry is reflected in the chart below, which highlights three bull cycles followed by three bear periods, all forming a repeating pattern. The most recent bottom, recorded on November 7, 2022, marked the start of the current bull cycle. If this pattern holds, Bitcoin could reach its next peak in the week of October 6, 2025. The bull cycle has led to Bitcoin breaking above $100,000 and now with an all-time high of $108,786, but like many others, the analyst predicted this peak will still be broken this year. This peak will likely mirror the explosive rallies that ended the 2017 and 2021 cycles and eventually surpass $125,000. Sell Everything In October 2025, Buy Back In October 2026 TradingShot‚Äôs primary advice is blunt but strategic: sell everything by October 2025. According to the analyst, this window could be the final opportunity to exit near the top before the next bear cycle takes hold. Counting 1064 days from the most recent bottom of $15,600 in November 07 2022, gives a time estimate for the next cycle top on October 6 2025. If history repeats itself, the subsequent bearish phase will likely last for 12 months and bottom out around October 12, 2026, before the next bull phase. Related Reading: Bitcoin Price Stalls Below $85,000 Psychological Level, Why A Drop To $74,000 Is Possible This timing is not speculative; it‚Äôs based on a consistent one-year bearish phase across three full market cycles. Therefore, it would be better to sell before October 2025 and start accumulating by October 2026. At the time of writing, Bitcoin is trading at $84,500, up by 0.9% in the past 24 hours and 48% away from the predicted peak of $125,000. Featured image from Adobe Stock, chart from Tradingview.com

title: Coinbase upgrades Solana infrastructure after user complaints
body: Coinbase has upgraded its infrastructure after receiving user complaints to support the Solana ecosystem better. The largest U.S. crypto exchange has rolled out improved failsafes, enhanced liquidity measures, and faster transaction processing. Additionally, Coinbase promised to speed up Solana transaction processing times in January after users encountered problems with depositing and withdrawing SOL. Coinbase supercharges Solana support with 5x faster throughput According to Coinbase , enhancements allowed quicker and more dependable sends and receives, reaffirming its dedication to providing industry-best results and dependability for its users. In addition, the crypto exchange highlighted that to satisfy demand, as Solana expanded in the future, it kept investing in its infrastructure. The crypto exchange also shared an X post that detailed the enhancements. Based on the X post, these enhancements included asynchronous transaction processing that will result in a five-fold increase in block processing throughput, four-fold improvements to the remote procedure call (RPC), failover augmentations to increase resilience, liquidity optimizations, and enhanced operational controls. Moreover, on January 21, Coinbase shared a post on the X platform stating that ‚ÄúCoinbase has seen unprecedented Solana transaction activity ‚Ä¶ and our systems have been unable to validate and process transactions at the speed that we are receiving them.‚Äù This came after users experienced delays when attempting to withdraw or deposit SOL, sometimes lasting hours. Interestingly, according to the crypto exchange, the volume of transactions at that time was ten times higher than usual. Meme coin trading has gained popularity, which has led to Solana‚Äôs widespread adoption Extensive meme coin trading had been a major factor in Solana‚Äôs high transaction volumes. This resulted partly from a significant rise in Solana‚Äôs market capitalization that occurred the weekend before the inauguration when the new president and first lady released meme coins on the blockchain, contributing to the rise in popularity of meme coin trading. However, weeks before Trump‚Äôs token launch, reports from sources revealed that Solana‚Äôs overall onchain trading volume and fees had reached all-time highs due to memecoin trading volume. On January 5, Solana‚Äôs onchain volume reached an all-time high of $3.79 billion, with approximately 4.5 million active addresses. Solana is up nearly 23% over the past week, making it one of the biggest gainers in the top 100 coins. According to CoinMarketCap reports, Solana is trading at $133.32, reflecting a 0.04% increase in the past 24 hours. With a market capitalization of around $69.68 billion, it holds the sixth spot among all cryptocurrencies by market value. T he recent surge comes amid Wednesday‚Äôs launch of Canada‚Äôs first spot Solana ETFs from issuers, including 3iQ, Evolve, CI, and Purpose. The exchange-traded funds feature staking functionality, providing investors with yield obtained by issuers staking their SOL to support the Solana blockchain. Spot Solana ETFs have yet to be approved in the United States. However, firms including VanEck, 21Shares, and Bitwise have filed applications with the Securities and Exchange Commission to launch such products. Bitcoin and Ethereum spot ETFs were both approved in the U.S. in 2024. Alongside Solana, issuers have filed to launch a potentially wide range of additional spot crypto funds in the States, including those tied to XRP, Dogecoin, and even President Donald Trump‚Äôs official Solana-based meme coin. title: Exciting New Venture: AI Benchmarking Platform Chatbot Arena Forms Company
body: The world of Artificial Intelligence (AI) is constantly evolving, and staying ahead of the curve requires robust tools for evaluation and comparison. Enter Chatbot Arena, the AI benchmarking platform that has become a cornerstone for major AI labs. Now, in a major development, Chatbot Arena is taking a giant leap forward by forming its own company, Arena Intelligence Inc. This move signals a significant commitment to enhancing its platform and solidifying its role in the rapidly expanding AI landscape. Let‚Äôs dive into what this exciting development means for the AI community and beyond. What is Chatbot Arena and Why Does It Matter? Before we delve into the new company formation, it‚Äôs crucial to understand what Chatbot Arena is and why it has become so influential. Launched in 2023 and primarily managed by researchers affiliated with UC Berkeley, Chatbot Arena is a crowdsourced platform designed for AI model testing . Think of it as a neutral battleground where different AI models, including flagship models from giants like OpenAI, Google, and Anthropic, are put to the test by a global community of users. Here‚Äôs why Chatbot Arena is so important: Neutral Benchmarking: It offers a platform free from bias, allowing for objective comparisons between different AI models. This is vital in an industry where marketing hype can often overshadow genuine performance metrics. Community-Driven Evaluation: The power of crowdsourcing means a wide range of perspectives contribute to the evaluation process, making the benchmarking more comprehensive and reflective of real-world usage. Industry Standard: Major AI labs rely on Chatbot Arena for testing and showcasing their models, highlighting its credibility and influence within the AI industry. Transparency: By making the evaluation process public, Chatbot Arena fosters transparency and accountability in AI development. Arena Intelligence Inc.: A New Chapter for AI Benchmarking The announcement of Arena Intelligence Inc. marks a pivotal moment for Chatbot Arena. According to a recent blog post and reports from Bloomberg, this new corporate structure is designed to inject resources and accelerate the platform‚Äôs development. The team behind Chatbot Arena emphasizes that this move will enable them to significantly improve the platform beyond its current capabilities. What can we expect from this new AI company formation ? Enhanced Platform Features: With dedicated resources, Arena Intelligence Inc. is poised to introduce new features, improve user experience, and potentially expand the types of AI models and benchmarks offered. Sustained Neutrality: A core promise from the team is the continued commitment to providing a neutral testing ground, uninfluenced by external vested interests. This is crucial for maintaining the platform‚Äôs integrity and trustworthiness. Business Model Exploration: While details are still under wraps, the formation of a company suggests the exploration of sustainable business models. This could involve premium features, enterprise solutions, or other avenues to ensure long-term viability. Continued Industry Collaboration: Given Chatbot Arena‚Äôs existing partnerships with major AI players, Arena Intelligence Inc. will likely continue to collaborate with and serve the needs of the AI industry. The Backstory: From Grants to Company Chatbot Arena‚Äôs journey began in 2023, fueled by grants and donations from various sources. Notable supporters include Google‚Äôs Kaggle data science platform, Andreessen Horowitz, and Together AI. This initial funding underscores the industry‚Äôs recognition of the platform‚Äôs value and potential. However, relying solely on grants and donations can be limiting for long-term growth and innovation. The transition to a company structure provides Arena Intelligence Inc. with: Greater Financial Flexibility: As a company, Arena Intelligence Inc. can explore diverse revenue streams and attract investment, providing more financial stability and resources for expansion. Operational Independence: A company structure allows for more operational autonomy and strategic decision-making, enabling faster and more agile development cycles. Scalability: With a dedicated business framework, Arena Intelligence Inc. is better positioned to scale its operations, expand its team, and meet the growing demands of the AI benchmarking landscape. What Does This Mean for the Future of AI Model Testing? The formation of Arena Intelligence Inc. is a strong indicator of the increasing importance of independent AI model testing and benchmarking in the AI ecosystem. As AI models become more sophisticated and integrated into various aspects of our lives, the need for reliable and transparent evaluation becomes paramount. Here are some potential implications: Rise in Benchmarking Standards: Arena Intelligence Inc. could drive the development of more rigorous and standardized benchmarking methodologies, benefiting the entire AI industry. Increased Competition and Innovation: With a more robust platform, AI labs may be further incentivized to improve their models and compete for top spots on the Chatbot Arena leaderboard. Greater User Awareness: As Chatbot Arena gains more prominence, users may become more informed and discerning about AI model capabilities, leading to more responsible AI adoption. Potential for New Applications: The data and insights generated by Arena Intelligence Inc. could be valuable for researchers, developers, and businesses looking to understand and leverage the power of AI. Challenges and Opportunities Ahead While the formation of Arena Intelligence Inc. is undoubtedly positive, there are challenges to navigate and opportunities to seize. Challenges: Maintaining Neutrality: As a company, ensuring continued neutrality and avoiding any perception of bias will be crucial for maintaining trust and credibility. Developing a Sustainable Business Model: Finding the right business model that supports the platform‚Äôs growth without compromising its core mission will be an ongoing task. Competition: The AI benchmarking space is evolving, and Arena Intelligence Inc. will need to stay ahead of potential competitors. Opportunities: Expanding Services: Arena Intelligence Inc. could expand its services beyond chatbot benchmarking to include other AI domains, such as image recognition, natural language processing, and more. Enterprise Solutions: Developing tailored benchmarking solutions for businesses could be a significant growth area. Data and Insights Products: Leveraging the vast data collected through the platform to offer valuable insights and analytics to the AI industry. Conclusion: A Promising Future for AI Evaluation The transformation of Chatbot Arena into Arena Intelligence Inc. is a promising development for the AI world. It signifies a deeper commitment to advancing AI benchmarking platform capabilities and solidifying its position as a vital resource for the industry. As AI continues to permeate every aspect of our lives, platforms like Arena Intelligence Inc. will play an increasingly critical role in ensuring transparency, accountability, and continuous improvement in AI model development. The future of AI model testing looks brighter than ever with this exciting new venture. To learn more about the latest AI trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI features.

title: Urgent Call for Powell‚Äôs Exit: Trump‚Äôs Alarming Fed Criticism Shakes Markets
body: In a dramatic escalation of tensions between the White House and the Federal Reserve, former U.S. President Donald Trump has once again launched a scathing attack on Fed Chair Jerome Powell , demanding his removal. This latest outburst has sent ripples through financial markets, raising questions about the future direction of U.S. monetary policy and the independence of the central bank. For cryptocurrency enthusiasts and investors closely monitoring global economic signals, this development is particularly noteworthy as it adds another layer of uncertainty to the already complex macroeconomic landscape. Let‚Äôs delve deeper into Trump‚Äôs accusations, the Fed‚Äôs stance, and what this all means for the broader economy and potentially, the crypto markets. Why is Trump Targeting Jerome Powell and the Federal Reserve? Trump‚Äôs criticism of Jerome Powell and the Federal Reserve is not new, but this recent call for his removal marks a significant intensification. At the heart of Trump‚Äôs discontent lies the belief that the Fed‚Äôs monetary policy is hindering economic growth and putting the U.S. at a disadvantage compared to other nations. According to a post by Walter Bloomberg on X, Trump specifically pointed to the European Central Bank (ECB) as an example, highlighting their recent interest rate cut ‚Äì their seventh ‚Äì as a proactive measure the Fed has failed to emulate. Trump argues that the Fed‚Äôs inaction is making the U.S. less competitive globally. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of Trump‚Äôs main grievances: Accusation of Inaction: Trump claims the Fed is ‚Äúfalling behind global peers‚Äù like the ECB by not cutting interest rates aggressively enough. Economic Growth Concerns: He believes higher interest rates are stifling US economy growth and potentially leading to a recession. Global Competitiveness: Trump suggests that lower interest rates in other countries give them an unfair economic advantage over the US economy . Personal Animosity: There‚Äôs a history of strained relations between Trump and Jerome Powell , dating back to Powell‚Äôs appointment during Trump‚Äôs presidency. It‚Äôs important to remember that central bank independence is a cornerstone of modern economic policy in many countries. The idea is to shield monetary policy decisions from short-term political pressures, allowing central bankers to focus on long-term economic stability and price stability. Trump‚Äôs public pronouncements and calls for Powell‚Äôs removal challenge this established norm. The Fed‚Äôs Stance on Interest Rates and the US Economy The Federal Reserve , under Jerome Powell‚Äôs leadership, has been navigating a delicate balancing act. Their primary mandate is to maintain price stability (control inflation) and promote maximum employment. In recent times, the Fed has been focused on combating inflation, which surged in the aftermath of the pandemic and global supply chain disruptions. To tame inflation, the Fed aggressively raised interest rates throughout 2022 and 2023. While inflation has cooled down from its peak, it remains above the Fed‚Äôs 2% target. The Fed‚Äôs current approach is to maintain a restrictive monetary policy stance until they are confident that inflation is sustainably moving towards their target. Here‚Äôs a summary of the Fed‚Äôs current position: Factor Fed‚Äôs Stance Inflation Concerned, still above target Interest Rates Currently holding steady, but data-dependent US Economy Growth Monitoring, aiming for a ‚Äúsoft landing‚Äù (slowing inflation without causing a recession) Global Economic Conditions Considering, but primarily focused on domestic mandate The Fed argues that premature interest rate cuts could reignite inflationary pressures, potentially leading to more economic pain down the line. They emphasize a data-dependent approach, meaning their decisions will be guided by incoming economic data, particularly inflation and employment figures. Market Reaction and Betting Odds on Powell‚Äôs Departure Financial markets are sensitive to any signals regarding the future of monetary policy and the stability of the Federal Reserve . Trump‚Äôs comments have undoubtedly introduced an element of uncertainty. According to reports, betting odds on Jerome Powell‚Äôs departure this year have seen a notable increase. Kalshi, a prediction market platform, reported that the odds of Powell leaving his position in 2024 rose to 26% following Trump‚Äôs remarks. This increase in betting odds reflects market participants‚Äô acknowledgment of the heightened political pressure on Powell. While it‚Äôs important to note that these are just betting odds and not definitive predictions, they do indicate a growing perception of risk surrounding Powell‚Äôs tenure. Here‚Äôs what this market reaction suggests: Increased Uncertainty: Trump‚Äôs comments inject uncertainty into the market‚Äôs outlook for Fed policy. Potential for Volatility: Further escalations in Trump‚Äôs rhetoric could lead to increased market volatility, particularly in bond and stock markets. Focus on Fed Independence: The situation highlights the importance of central bank independence and the potential risks when this principle is challenged. Monitoring Political Developments: Investors will be closely watching political developments and any further signals regarding the Fed‚Äôs future leadership. Impact on Cryptocurrency Markets While the immediate focus of Trump‚Äôs criticism is on traditional financial markets and the US economy , the cryptocurrency market is not immune to these developments. Crypto markets are increasingly intertwined with the broader macroeconomic environment. Here‚Äôs how Trump‚Äôs stance on Jerome Powell and the Fed could potentially impact the crypto space: Economic Uncertainty & Safe Haven Assets: Increased economic uncertainty can sometimes drive investors towards perceived safe haven assets, and in some cases, cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin have been considered as such. However, this relationship is not always consistent and can be influenced by various factors. Dollar Strength/Weakness: Fed policy and interest rate decisions can impact the strength of the US dollar. A weaker dollar could, in theory, make dollar-denominated assets like Bitcoin more attractive to international investors. Conversely, a stronger dollar could have the opposite effect. Risk Appetite: Overall market sentiment and risk appetite are crucial drivers for crypto markets. If Trump‚Äôs criticism leads to broader market jitters or a perception of increased economic risk, it could impact investor sentiment towards cryptocurrencies as well. Regulatory Landscape: Political shifts and changes in administration can also influence the regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies. While not directly related to Powell‚Äôs removal, the broader political climate can indirectly affect crypto regulations. Navigating the Uncertainty: Key Takeaways Trump‚Äôs renewed attack on Jerome Powell and the Federal Reserve adds another layer of complexity to the economic and market outlook. For those involved in the cryptocurrency space, it‚Äôs crucial to stay informed and understand the potential implications. Here are some key takeaways and actionable insights: Monitor Economic Data: Pay close attention to key economic indicators, particularly inflation and employment data, as these will heavily influence the Fed‚Äôs future decisions. Stay Updated on Fed Communication: Follow speeches and statements from Fed officials, including Jerome Powell , to gauge their thinking and potential policy shifts. Assess Market Sentiment: Keep an eye on market sentiment and volatility in both traditional and crypto markets, as these can be indicators of investor reactions to political and economic developments. Diversification and Risk Management: In times of uncertainty, diversification and robust risk management strategies are even more critical in your investment portfolio, including crypto holdings. Understand Macroeconomic Interplay: Recognize that cryptocurrency markets are increasingly influenced by macroeconomic factors and global economic events. Conclusion: A Test for Fed Independence? Donald Trump‚Äôs forceful call for Jerome Powell‚Äôs removal is more than just political rhetoric; it‚Äôs a direct challenge to the independence of the Federal Reserve and a potential source of market instability. While the likelihood of Powell‚Äôs immediate removal remains uncertain, the episode underscores the ongoing tensions between political pressures and central bank autonomy. For cryptocurrency investors and the broader financial world, this situation warrants close monitoring. The coming months will be crucial in determining how this drama unfolds and what implications it holds for the US economy and global markets. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: Kyrgyzstan‚Äôs president signs CBDC law giving ‚Äòdigital som‚Äô legal status
body: Kyrgyzstan President Sadyr Zhaparov has signed a constitutional law authorizing the launch of a central bank digital currency pilot project while also giving the ‚Äúdigital som‚Äù ‚Äî the national currency in digital form ‚Äî legal tender status. The law gives the National Bank of the Kyrgyz Republic the exclusive right to issue the digital som, establish the rules for its issuance and circulation, and oversee the platform on which the national currency will operate, Kyrgyzstan‚Äôs presidential office said on April 17. However, a final decision on whether to officially issue the CBDC is not expected until the end of 2026, local outlet Trend News Agency reported in December. If the central bank decides to adopt the digital som, it would also need to outline cryptographic protection measures to ensure the digital som remains secure and isn‚Äôt used for fraudulent transactions. Testing of the digital som platform is expected to take place sometime this year. Zhaparov‚Äôs sign-off comes nearly a month after Kyrgyzstan‚Äôs parliament, the Jogorku Kenesh, approved the amendment to Kyrgyzstan‚Äôs constitutional law on March 18. CBDCs continue to be heavily criticized by some members of the crypto community, flagging concerns that they could undermine financial privacy and enable excessive government oversight, among other things. While 115 nations have initiated CBDC projects, only four CBDCs have officially launched ‚Äî the Bahamas Sand Dollar, Nigeria‚Äôs e-Naira, Zimbabwe‚Äôs ZiG and Jamaica‚Äôs JAM-DEX, data from cbdctracker.org shows. Over 90 CBDC projects are yet to move past the research stage. Kyrgyzstan continues to make moves in crypto Earlier this month, former Binance CEO Changpeng ‚ÄúCZ‚Äù Zhao said he would begin advising Kyrgyzstan on blockchain and crypto-related regulation after signing a memorandum of understanding with the country‚Äôs foreign investment agency. Zhaparov said the initiative would assist with the growth of the economy and the security of virtual assets, ‚Äúgenerating new opportunities for businesses and society as a whole.‚Äù Source: Sadyr Zhaparov Related: Bitcoin price levels to watch as Fed rate cut hopes fade The mountainous, land-locked country is considered well-suited for crypto mining operations due to its abundant renewable energy resources, much of which is underutilized. Over 30% of Kyrgyzstan‚Äôs total energy supply comes from hydroelectric power plants, but only 10% of the country‚Äôs potential hydropower has been tapped, according to a report by the International Energy Agency. title: Bitcoin dip buyers nibble at BTC range lows but are risk off until $90K becomes support
body: Bitcoin‚Äôs (BTC) realized market cap reached a new all-time high of $872 billion, but data from Glassnode reflects investors‚Äô lack of enthusiasm at BTC‚Äôs current price levels. In a recent X post, the analytics platform pointed out that despite the realized cap milestone, the monthly growth rate of the metric has dropped to 0.9% month over month, which implied a risk-off sentiment in the market. Bitcoin realized cap net position. Source: X.com Realized cap measures the total value of all Bitcoin at the price they last moved, reflecting the actual capital invested, providing insight into Bitcoin‚Äôs economic activity. A slowing growth rate highlights a positive but reduced capital inflow, suggesting fewer new investors or less activity from current holders. Additionally, Glassnode‚Äôs realized profit and loss chart recently exhibited a sharp decline of 40%, which signals high profit-taking or loss realization. The data platform explained, ‚ÄúThis suggests saturation in investor activity and often precedes a consolidation phase as the market searches for a new equilibrium.‚Äù While new investors remained sidelined, existing investors are probably adopting a cautious approach due to the short-term holder‚Äôs realized price. Data from CryptoQuant suggested that the current short-term realized price is $91,600. With BTC currently consolidating under the threshold, it implies short-term holders are underwater, which can increase selling pressure if they sell to cut their losses. Bitcoin short-term holders‚Äô price and MVRV. Source: CryptoQuant Similarly, Bitcoin's short-term holder market value to realized value remained below 1, a level historically associated with buying opportunities and further proof that short-term holders are at a loss. Related: Bitcoin US vs. offshore exchange ratio flashes bullish signal, hinting at BTC price highs in 2025 Bitcoin chops between US and Korean traders Data shows a sentiment divergence between Bitcoin traders in the US and Korea. The Coinbase premium, reflecting US trading, recently spiked, signaling strong US demand and potential Bitcoin price gains. Conversely, the Kimchi premium index fell during the correction, indicating lagging retail engagement among Korea-based traders. This particular uneven demand is reflected in Bitcoin‚Äôs recent price action. The chart shows that Bitcoin‚Äôs price has oscillated between a tight range of $85,440-$82,750 since April 11. On the 4-hour chart, BTC has retained support from the 50-day, 100-day, and 200-day moving averages, but on the 1-day chart, these indicators are putting resistance on the bullish structure. Bitcoin 4-hour chart.
